entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Hunters Point
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
